channel.title: mediatomb on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in mediatomb on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Working mediatomb config.xml for Samsung UE37C5000
item.description: I have a NAS and an Samsung UE37C5000 UPNP/DLNA enabled led TV. Streaming from the first to the second should be easy, right? Well after a few tweaks MediaTomb makes it possible. I don’t say this is the best configuration possible but it’s the one that works INCLUDING pause and fast forwarding. Relevant from the default are the custom header, extended protocol info and the mkv and avi lines. MediaTomb uuid:0f53d0ff-5951-4d27-8fa7-06ce378ae789 /var/lib/mediatomb /usr/share/mediatomb/web mediatomb.
